name: Reading Partners
description: Reading Partners' mission is to help children become lifelong readers by empowering communities to provide individualized instruction with measurable results. Our vision is that all children will have the literacy skills they need to reach their full potential.
fullDescription: Reading Partners' mission is to help children become lifelong readers by empowering communities to provide individualized instruction with measurable results. Our vision is that all children will have the literacy skills they need to reach their full potential.
